channel.title: testing on Hannes Dorfmann
channel.description: Recent content in testing on Hannes Dorfmann

item.title: Instantiate test data with Instantiator
item.description: I have noticed that most of the unit tests I write are testing how my code transforms data or business logic. My class or business logic just needs data as input (thus I need some test data to write unit tests). For example, most of my android apps load a list of items from the backend and then the android app is transforming that data into some state object or front-end specific domain objects.
